title: Ubisoft may finally be planning a return to Steam
description: Backend data suggests that a Steam release for Assassin's Creed Valhalla could be coming.

title: EVE Online blows up an entire star and everyone around it to kick off a new inter-faction war
description: Today's Uprising expansion makes big changes to faction warfare in low-sec.

title: Guild Wars 2 just resurrected a city that was destroyed in 2013
description: The original Living World story is now totally replayable and rewards you with a return to old Lion's Arch.

title: Halo Infinite's 'biggest update yet' finally adds campaign co-op and the Forge
description: The winter update is live now.

title: Bungie has given Destiny 2's buggiest gun an amazing easter egg
description: Telesto has finally reached its final form.

title: CS:GO caster fired from Rio Major after alleged 'incident' involving booze, police, and a smashed-up TV
description: Matthew "Sadokist" Trivett has been sent home in disgrace.

title: Cyberpunk 2077 patch prevents boobs from clipping through clothes
description: The Ripperdoc's work will now be of higher quality.

title: Ubisoft still says the Sands of Time remake hasn't been cancelled, but preorders have been refunded
description: There's still no release date, but there is a new FAQ about the statement of the game, which Ubisoft insists is still happening.

title: Overwatch 2 amasses 35 million players in its first month
description: Heroes never die. All 35 million of 'em.

title: PvP MMO Crowfall is being shut down indefinitely to save it
description: Monumental can't build new campaigns and maintain the live game at the same time.

title: Death Stranding hits 10 million sales as it celebrates its third birthday
description: That's a lot of baby-wielding backpackers.

title: Electronic Arts kills one of the best racing series of all time
description: The next Project Cars game has been cancelled and EA and will not invest any further in the series.

title: EA creates the 'Ultimate FIFA soundtrack' for the final entry
description: What, no Robbie Williams?

title: Modern Warfare 2 is the best launch in COD's history after selling $1 billion in 10 days
description: Over 1 Billion matches and 200 Million Hours played.

title: In this new Viking city builder, every citizen has their owns skills and personalities
description: Find the perfect Viking for every job in the settlement.

title: Wordle is shaking up its rules and wordlist
description: Say goodbye to easy plurals.

title: Massive Grand Theft Auto 6 leak 'won't have any influence on development,' says Take-Two boss
description: Strauss Zelnick called the leak "terribly unfortunate."

title: This Gotham Knights update is 9GB and we don't know why
description: Robin your storage space.

title: Razer Restorify lets you add a smol piece of carbon credit at the checkout
description: Get on the carbon offsetting bandwagon with every Razer purchase.

title: Football Manager 2023 has that Champions League-winning quality
description: As series' fans get wiser, the game gets smarter.

title: Over $1B worth of stolen Bitcoin found in popcorn tin
description: Still, sad to open a popcorn tin to no popcorn.

title: This accordion made out of two C64s is a chip tune delight

title: Take-Two boss says the company is a 'hit factory' that'll always prefer game delays to 'flops'
description: GTA, XCOM, and Borderlands publisher Take-Two is very confident about its upcoming releases.

title: It's not at all clear what Call of Duty 2023 will be
description: Will Modern Warfare 2 get another year in the spotlight?

title: Oculus co-founder creates a 'thought-provoking' VR headset that will literally kill you if you die in a game
description: When "if you die in the game, you die in real life" is taken to its extreme.

description: Modern Warfare 2 is selling double what the series used to on PC.

title: That wonderful little Gnome Child from RuneScape is coming to a MOBA near you
